Title: Spider-Man: Far from Home
Stars: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal, Marisa Tomei
Summary: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

Title: Dark Phoenix
Stars: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Nicholas Hoult
Summary: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

Title: Avengers: Endgame
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Title: Captain Marvel
Stars: Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Jude Law
Summary: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Stars: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Venom
Stars: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed, Scott Haze
Summary: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
Stars: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Peña, Walton Goggins
Summary: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

Title: Deadpool 2
Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison
Summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
Summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Title: Black Panther
Stars: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
Summary: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Stars: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
Summary: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Stars: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei
Summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Stars: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
Summary: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Logan
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
Summary: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

Title: Doctor Strange
Stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, Benedict Wong
Summary: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Stars: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Nicholas Hoult
Summary: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Stars: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan
Summary: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Title: Deadpool
Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller, Ed Skrein
Summary: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Title: Fantastic Four
Stars: Miles Teller, Kate Mara, Michael B. Jordan, Jamie Bell
Summary: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

Title: Ant-Man
Stars: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll, Evangeline Lilly
Summary: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Summary: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

Title: Big Hero 6
Stars: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung, T.J. Miller
Summary: The special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada. They team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana
Summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
Stars: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman, James McAvoy
Summary: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Stars: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Paul Giamatti
Summary: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Stars: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Redford
Summary: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

Title: Thor: The Dark World
Stars: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Stellan Skarsgård
Summary: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

Title: The Wolverine
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto, Rila Fukushima
Summary: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.

Title: Iron Man Three
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle
Summary: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man
Stars: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans, Irrfan Khan
Summary: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

Title: The Avengers
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
Summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Ciarán Hinds, Idris Elba, Violante Placido
Summary: Johnny Blaze, tortured by the Ghost Rider's curse, gets a chance of redemption through protecting the Devil's son, whose father is pursuing him.

Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Stars: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell
Summary: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

Title: X: First Class
Stars: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Kevin Bacon
Summary: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

Title: Thor
Stars: Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
Summary: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Title: Iron Man 2
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle
Summary: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

Title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds, Danny Huston
Summary: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

Title: Punisher: War Zone
Stars: Ray Stevenson, Dominic West, Julie Benz, Doug Hutchison
Summary: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

Title: The Incredible Hulk
Stars: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth, William Hurt
Summary: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

Title: Iron Man
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
Summary: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Title: 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
Stars: Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis
Summary: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

Title: Spider-Man 3
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Topher Grace, Thomas Haden Church
Summary: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Title: Ghost Rider
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott, Matt Long
Summary: When motorcycle rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil to save his father's life, he is transformed into the Ghost Rider, the Devil's own bounty hunter, and is sent to hunt down sinners.

Title: X-Men: The Last Stand
Stars: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry, Famke Janssen
Summary: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

Title: Fantastic Four
Stars: Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans, Jessica Alba
Summary: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

Title: Elektra
Stars: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee, Kirsten Zien
Summary: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

Title: Blade: Trinity
Stars: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Parker Posey, Ryan Reynolds
Summary: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

Title: Spider-Man 2
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco
Summary: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

Title: The Punisher
Stars: Thomas Jane, John Travolta, Samantha Mathis, Laura Harring
Summary: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

Title: Hulk
Stars: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas
Summary: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

Title: X2
Stars: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry, Ian McKellen
Summary: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

Title: Daredevil
Stars: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell, Michael Clarke Duncan
Summary: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Title: Spider-Man
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco
Summary: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

Title: Blade II
Stars: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman, Leonor Varela
Summary: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

Title: X-Men
Stars: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen
Summary: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

Title: Blade
Stars: Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff, Kris Kristofferson, N'Bushe Wright
Summary: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

Title: Howard the Duck
Stars: Lea Thompson, Jeffrey Jones, Tim Robbins, Ed Gale
Summary: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

Title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
Stars: Margot Robbie, Rosie Perez, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Jurnee Smollett
Summary: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

Title: Joker
Stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
Summary: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

Title: Shazam!
Stars: Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, Asher Angel, Jack Dylan Grazer
Summary: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Title: Aquaman
Stars: Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe, Patrick Wilson
Summary: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

Title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
Stars: Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Tara Strong
Summary: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

Title: Justice League
Stars: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Jason Momoa, Ezra Miller
Summary: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

Title: Wonder Woman
Stars: Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Robin Wright, Lucy Davis
Summary: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

Title: Suicide Squad
Stars: Will Smith, Jared Leto, Margot Robbie, Viola Davis
Summary: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Stars: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Jesse Eisenberg
Summary: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

Title: Man of Steel
Stars: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon, Diane Lane
Summary: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened, when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.

Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman
Summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Title: Green Lantern
Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard, Mark Strong
Summary: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

Title: Jonah Hex
Stars: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich, Michael Fassbender
Summary: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

Title: Watchmen
Stars: Jackie Earle Haley, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino, Malin Akerman
Summary: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

Title: The Dark Knight
Stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
Summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Title: Superman Returns
Stars: Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth, James Marsden
Summary: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

Title: Batman Begins
Stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson
Summary: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

Title: Constantine
Stars: Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Djimon Hounsou, Shia LaBeouf
Summary: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

Title: Catwoman
Stars: Halle Berry, Sharon Stone, Benjamin Bratt, Lambert Wilson
Summary: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

Title: Batman & Robin
Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell, Uma Thurman
Summary: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

Title: Batman Forever
Stars: Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Jim Carrey, Nicole Kidman
Summary: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

Title: Batman Returns
Stars: Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito, Michelle Pfeiffer, Christopher Walken
Summary: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

Title: Batman
Stars: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
Summary: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Title: The Return of Swamp Thing
Stars: Dick Durock, Heather Locklear, Louis Jourdan, Sarah Douglas
Summary: In this tongue-in-cheek sequel, the benevolent bog creature falls for the vegetarian, plant-loving daughter of the evil scientist who created him.

Title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Stars: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder, Jackie Cooper
Summary: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Title: Supergirl
Stars: Helen Slater, Faye Dunaway, Peter O'Toole, Mia Farrow
Summary: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

Title: Superman III
Stars: Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Margot Kidder, Jackie Cooper
Summary: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

Title: Superman II
Stars: Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Ned Beatty
Summary: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

Title: Superman
Stars: Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman, Marlon Brando
Summary: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
